original_text: But thou, O Lord, shalt laugh at them; thou shalt have all the heathen in derision.
korean_text: 여호와여 주께서 그들을 비웃으시며 모든 나라들을 조롱하시리이다

sentences.original_text: But thou, O Lord, shalt laugh at them
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 주 당신은 그들을 비웃으실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: thou shalt have all the heathen in derision
